video.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood
video.synopsis: Fred Rogers introduces young viewers to the people and places around him, helping children learn about their world and how to use their imaginations.

episodes.synopsis: Jeff Erlanger, a young boy who uses an electric wheelchair, visits Mister Rogers and talks openly and honestly about his disability.
episodes.title: Mister Rogers Talks About Divorce / A Boy in a Wheelchair

episodes.synopsis: Mister Rogers shows a video of how crayons are made. In the Neighborhood of Make-Believe, King Friday announces a drawing contest.
episodes.title: Competition / A Favorite Factory Visit, Crayons!

episodes.synopsis: On Grandparents' Day, the Neighborhood hosts an opera featuring Daniel Tiger, who is searching for his long-lost grandfather.
episodes.title: Grandparents / A Neighborhood Opera, a Granddad for Daniel

episodes.synopsis: Mister Rogers visits with STOMP!, the percussionist performers who use everyday objects and their hands and feet to make exciting music.
episodes.title: Mad Feelings / A Visit with STOMP!

episodes.synopsis: Bill Nye the Science Guy shows a science experiment using baking soda and vinegar to blow up a balloon. In Make-Believe, all that was lost is found.
episodes.title: Sharing / Dump Trucks at a Construction Site

episodes.synopsis: The Flying Karamazov Brothers visit the neighborhood, and Mister Rogers explains why it's important to like yourself just the way you are.
episodes.title: Be Yourself / The Flying Karamazov Brothers

episodes.synopsis: Magician David Copperfield teaches Mister Rogers how to do a magic trick. In Make-Believe, X gives flying lessons.
episodes.title: Be Yourself / A Visit with Magician David Copperfield

episodes.synopsis: Mister Rogers visits with Maya Lin at her studio to see how she makes models. In Make-Believe, there's a video visit with cellist Yo-Yo Ma.
episodes.title: Little and Big / A Visit with Architect Maya Lin

episodes.synopsis: In Make-Believe, the neighbors find their own ways to express themselves. Mister Rogers has a video that helps us appreciate different kinds of art.
episodes.title: Celebrating the Arts / Appreciating All Kinds of Art

episodes.synopsis: Mister Rogers visits a shop where musicians are playing different kinds of instruments. Mr. McFeely brings a video of people making ice cream cones.
episodes.title: Curiosity / Homemade Musical Instruments

episodes.synopsis: Ella Jenkins teaches Mister Rogers a rhythmic clapping game. Neighbors in Make-Believe all find ways to be part of the Bass Violin Festival.
episodes.title: Making Music / A Hand Clapping Game with Ella Jenkins

episodes.synopsis: Mister Rogers shows how people make construction paper. In Make-Believe, Lady Elaine Fairchilde is teaching others how to use a boomerang.
episodes.title: Learning / How People Make Construction Paper

episodes.synopsis: Tom O'Horgan shows viewers his collection of unusual musical instruments. Mister Rogers shows how he might play the piano if he feels happy or angry.
episodes.title: Making Music / Tom O'Horgan's Unusual Musical Instruments

episodes.synopsis: Mister Rogers visits a pediatrician who shows young viewers what might happen during a checkup. In Make-Believe, Cousin Mary Owl plans a reunion.
episodes.title: Families / A Visit to the Pediatrician

episodes.synopsis: Mister Rogers talks about families that are formed by adoption. In the Neighborhood of Make-Believe, Ana wonders if she was adopted.
episodes.title: Families / Mister Rogers Talks About Adoption

episodes.synopsis: Mister Rogers plays dress-up and shows a video about how people make sneakers. In Make-Believe, everyone searches for the king's lost crown.
episodes.title: Dress Up / Trying on Different Roles

episodes.synopsis: Mister Rogers and Mr. McFeely sort their garbage and take it to a recycling center to see what happens to discarded bags, bottles and cans.
episodes.title: Caring for the Environment / A Visit to a Recycling Center

episodes.synopsis: Mister Rogers shows some toy machines, and he rides on real ones that lift people and cars. Mr. McFeely delivers a hydraulic platform in Make-Believe.
episodes.title: Up and Down / Elevators and Escalators

episodes.synopsis: In Make-Believe, it's the first day of school. Mister Rogers shows how pretending to play school helps children get ready for it.
episodes.title: Mister Rogers Goes to School

episodes.synopsis: Mister Rogers takes a neighbor's dog for a walk. In the Neighborhood of Make-Believe, puppet Ana wishes for a kitten for her birthday.
episodes.title: Mister Rogers Talks About Pets
